name: Hummus
description: Smooth, creamy hummus that tastes even better the next day.
ingredients:
1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 clove garlic (raw, 1 clove is plenty)
2â€“4 tbsp tahini
Lemon juice (start with ~2 tsp, adjust to taste)
Big pinch of salt
Olive oil (~1 tbsp, or try sesame oil)
steps:
1. Blend all ingredients in a blender or with a stick blender.
2. Add water as needed to reach desired texture.
3. Taste and adjust tahini, lemon juice, and salt.
